thread.title: Nokia 150 Dual feature phone now available in India for Rs 2,295
thread.title_full: Nokia 150 Dual feature phone now available in India for Rs 2,295

title: Nokia 150 Dual feature phone now available in India for Rs 2,295
text:
Nokia 150 Dual feature phone now available in India for Rs 2,295 Nokia 150 Dual feature phone now available in India for Rs 2,295 By - March 27, 2017 “The Nokia 150 is a feature phone with a 2.4-inch display, FM radio, MP3 player, and a VGA camera” 
Last December, HMD Global, the company that now owns the rights to manufacture and sell Nokia-branded phones, had launched its first mobile phone called the Nokia 150 . The phone was introduced in both single-SIM and dual-SIM variants. Now the dual-SIM model of the device is available in India. The phone is being offered on Flipkart for Rs 2,295 for the black model and Rs 2,399 for the white variant. The device is also listed on Amazon India, but is currently not available to buy. 
The Nokia 150 comes with a scratch-resistant polycarbonate shell. The phone offers a 2.4-inch QVGA display, and runs Nokia Series 30+ operating system. The features include a large keypad, a torch light, FM Radio, a dedicated MP3 player, support for microSD cards up to 32GB, Bluetooth 3.0 with SLAM functionality, the classic Snake Xenzia game, up to 25 days of standby time and 22 hours of talk time. A VGA camera with LED flash on the back completes the list of the specs. Facebook Comments
